description:
If you're not a member or looking for a reason to join, this video is it!
This is one seriously hot video. Period.
Ever since I started working with Adam, I had wanted to pair him with Zack. Both these guys will just about do anything, and with so much enthusiasm, you get swept away with them.
But first, a little background.
My friend and I were at the local porn store, buying lube (In the industrial barrel size of course), when we spotted some big 'ole double ended dildos.
We kidded about who would be willing to do a scene with it. I knew Adam would try anything twice, and Zack loves to be naughty, so I figured I would try to convince them.
Neither needed convincing.
We tried to shoot this scene while we were at the Adult Expo in Vegas, but between the event and the all the partying the boys did, we just couldn't make it happen.
So I was extra eager to film this video.
Neither let me down. These guys know hot to suck, fuck, and ride a double-ended dildo!
The cumshot is Grade A Primo! You won't believe it!
title: Adam & Zack Randall - Wrapped
